entry.title: Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 28, 21:00 PST - Mar 1, 01:00 PST Feb 25, 15:39 PST Scheduled - Our SMS carrier partner in Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 February 2023 at 21:00 PST until 01 March 2023 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Canada handsets via short-codes.

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

entry.title: MMS Delivery Delays to US Carriers From a Subset of Short Codes
entry.summary: Feb 28, 12:37 PST Resolved - We are no longer experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Verizon and delivery receipt delays to AT&T and T-Mobile from a subset of US short codes. This incident has been resolved. Feb 28, 10:49 PST Monitoring - We are observing recovery in MMS delivery delays to Verizon and delivery receipt delays to AT&T and T-Mobile from a subset of US short codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Feb 28, 10:12 PST Investigating - We are experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to Verizon and delivery receipt delays to AT&T and T-Mobile. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Incident: Audio files not loading on iOS
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From February 22nd, 2023 at 2:00 PM until February 24th, 2023 2:16 PM PST, some users experienced issues loading audio files on iOS.
We discovered that the server was returning an unexpected code in response to requests for audio files, causing the app to only partially load the content. We made a change to ensure the server returned the correct response code, resolving the issue for all affected customers.
If you continue to run into any trouble, please feel free to reach out to us at feedback@slack.com.

entry.title: RESOLVED: We're aware of a problem with Google Voice affecting a significant subset of users. We will provide an update by Feb 27, 2023, 3:30 PM UTC detailing when we expect to resolve the problem. Please note that this resolution time is an estimate and may change.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2023-02-27 12:58 and ended at 2023-02-27 13:11 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

The Mini Incident Report is available on the Google Cloud Service Health Dashboard while we prepare a full Issue Summary Report.

Affected products: Google Voice

entry.title: Incident: Some customers may be experiencing issues with several apps
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
From February 23, 2023 at 4:00 p.m. PST until February 24, 2023 at 12:13 a.m. PST, some customers were not able to use several apps within the workspace. The issue was caused by a certificate, which didn't push online successfully after renewal. The certificate has now been pushed and the issue is resolved.
*The times mentioned above have been updated since our initial posting to accurately reflect the duration of this issue.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers in the Phillipines may not be able to connect to Slack
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From February 23, 2023 at 5:24 p.m. PST until February 23, 2023 at 8:23 p.m. PST, some customers in the Phillipines were not able to access Slack. We looked into it and found that the issue was an external factor that we have now addressed it on our end and the impacted users have confirmed that they can now access Slack.

entry.title: User experience may be degraded, API timing out. Scenario executions not affected.
entry.summary: Feb 23, 20:35 CET Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Feb 23, 18:52 CET Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Feb 23, 18:02 CET Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. Feb 23, 17:18 CET Investigating - Website performance may be degraded and API requests are timing out. Users may not be able to use the web interface to manage their organizations and scenarios. The team is currently investigating the root cause of the issue.

entry.title: Incident: Errors when running workflows
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On February 22nd, 2023 from 08:44 AM PST to 09:22 AM PST, some users experienced issues with using workflows.
We discovered an issue that prevented workflow API calls from successfully writing changes to our database. After restarting this process, workflow functionality was restored for all impacted users.
We continued monitoring our metrics and announced the resolution when we were confident the issue was resolved.
If you continue to run into any issues please feel free to reach out to our support team.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers are experiencing server errors with the GitHub Enterprise Server app
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Monday February 20th 2023 at 15:00 PST until Tuesday February 21st 2023 22:00 PST,
A PR that changed the type of an argument used by the Github plugin was pushed to production. This change caused a type mismatch and subsequently HTTP 500 errors. The issue was resolved once the PR was reverted.
We're very sorry for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Incident: Issues with mobile notifications for Enterprise Grid customers
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Tuesday, February 14th, 2023 at 09:52 AM PST until Tuesday, February 21st, 2023 at 08:56 AM PST, some enterprise customers experienced issues with the delivery of mobile notifications on Android devices.
Our team identified that the cause of the issue was linked to a recent change with notification clearing. We rolled back this change which fixed the issue.
We're very sorry for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers are having issues loading the admin page
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From February 14th, 2023 at 10:49AM PST until February 20th, 2023 at 1:16 AM PST some customers were unable to load their workspace's admin page. We traced this issue to a recent code change, which resulted in the workspace token being invalidated when visiting the admin page from a browser. Reverting this code change fixed the issue for all affected customers.

entry.title: Incident: Files upload API not uploading files to thread
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On Tuesday February 14th, 2023 from 1:19 AM PST to 3:50 AM PST some customers reported an issue where the API method files.upload created a new message instead of uploading files in a thread.
Our team identified that the cause of the issue was linked to a recent update. This change was rolled back which fixed the issue.
Note: This summary has been edited since its initial posting to better align with Slack's communication guidelines.

entry.title: Incident: Threads are currently not loading for some users
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On Monday February 13th, 2023 at 07:00PM to Tuesday February 14th, 2023 at 01:02 AM PST, customers were unable to view threads in public channels they had not joined. This was caused by a recent code change - we've deployed a correction to this and the issue is now resolved.
Should customers continue to experience this behaviour, a hard refresh of the Slack client will fix this.

entry.title: Performance Issues
entry.summary: Feb 13, 08:36 PST Resolved - Engineering has implemented mitigations, which should have resolved performance issues. We’ll continue to monitor performance and provide updates if we run into issues again. We found that page analytics events, such as page views and page edits, did not save during the time of this incident. Impacted users may see their page related analytics as undercounted for February 13, 2023. Our team is looking into how we can prevent this from happening in the future. We appreciate your patience while we work on making these improvements. Feb 13, 08:17 PST Investigating - Notion users may experience general performance slowness. Engineering is currently investigating and implementing mitigations.

entry.title: Issues Affecting Guest Name Parameters in Webhooks
entry.summary: Feb 9, 17:43 PST Resolved - A fix has been implemented as of Feb 9, 10:00 UTC and webhooks should be returning names in full as expected. We deeply regret this incident and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. Thank you for your patience and understanding. In the event reservation webhook notifications are still returning only initials for the guest name parameters, please attempt a GET reservations request. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and are working towards a resolution. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Centralized inbox filters
entry.summary:
Improvement
Sounds impossible to find a guest message in seconds ? As we keep improving our features, we work closely with property users and managers like yourself to learn how we can help you run your business more efficiently. After several workshops, reflections, and feedback, our Smily team did several adjustments to help you use our centralized Inbox in order to simplify this daily communication. We added several filters to help you find the conversations easily in the Inbox, you can now filter by the following criterias: Conversation status Assignee Guest Booking stage Booking status Rental Booking tag Rental tag
This way you can find the exact conversation you are looking for in a matter of seconds :) For more details please see the article from our manual Wishing you all a pleasant day!

author.name: Yannick, Customer Care Team Leader - Pro Team

Please retry any requests that may have failed with 500 Errors. entry.title: Incident: Errors running workflows
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 31, 2023 from 11:40 AM PST to 11:55 AM PST, customers may have experienced issues with workflows not running as expected or posting duplicate messages.
A network event prevented access to some of the database servers that support workflows. This disruption meant that the remaining servers were unable to handle the workflow load.
We restarted the affected servers and manually increased the capacity to resolve the issue, restoring normal workflow behaviour.

entry.title: Incident: Users unable to enter team name when creating a workspace
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 31, 2023 from 9:44 AM to 3:17 PM PST, some customers may have experienced issues creating new workspaces.
An error in our onboarding flow meant we were incorrectly assuming new workspaces had completed the onboarding process before any onboarding actually took place, leaving these newly created workspaces in an unusable limbo state. We reverted the change that caused the initial onboarding inconsistencies, then released a fix to resolve some dependencies from the reverted file.
Everyone should be able to create new workspaces as normal once again, although you may experience some overzealous onboarding prompts as the system resolves any lingering inconsistencies.

entry.summary: Jan 31, 07:00 CET Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Jan 31, 05:00 CET In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Jan 26, 16:15 CET Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Tuesday 31st of January, between 5 AM and 7 AM CEST, when you can expect few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services might be potentially affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: Incident with Packages and Pages
entry.summary: Jan 30, 22:23 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 30, 22:21 UTC Update - Pages is operating normally. Jan 30, 22:08 UTC Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate. Jan 30, 21:55 UTC Update - Packages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate. Jan 30, 21:48 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Pages.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Jan 30, 17:12 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 30, 16:28 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners affecting a small number of customers, we continue to investigate and work on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 15:54 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners, we continue to investigate and work on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 15:17 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners, we continue to investigate and work on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 14:39 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners, we continue to investigate and work on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 14:07 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners, we continue to investigate and work on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 13:33 UTC Update - Actions continues to experience an outage with larger runners, we are currently investigating and working on mitigation. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 12:57 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing an outage with larger runners. Hosted and self-hosted runners are not impacted. Jan 30, 12:07 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
